title: Hey zk0x, i have some questions for yoU!
body:
zk0x: SMILLLLEEE! WHAT IS IT?
Someone:  What do you do after you wake up? Smile?
zk0x: um...I prob make some funny face after i just woke up, ya know? 
Someone: Ok, so after that, do you smile?
zk0x: Um...I go to bathroom first then brush my teeth..take a shower...uhh...i think that's it?
Someone: *SIGHS!* So after that, do you smillleee?
zk0x: I just start my day. Basically.
Someone: ffs, zk0x. DO YOU EVEN SMILE?!!
zk0x: After my day, I sit down and relax.
Someone: and smile?
zk0x: play league, write a new script, or laugh at people on GD.
Someone: then......
zk0x: then...stream.
Someone: You are not taking me seriously. 
zk0x: You shouldn't be serious. You have to stay SMILLLLLEEEEEEEE!!
Someone: wow...


{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
